Product Distribution.description: Shipping and distribution to retailers and direct sales channels.

User Setup and Configuration.description: Initial setup by the user, including transferring data and configuring settings.

Daily Usage.description: Regular use of the phone for communication, browsing, and applications.

Screen Repair.description: Repair or replacement of damaged screens.

Device Decommissioning.description: Process for decommissioning the device from active use.
